summary: A woman requests a letter to her ex be retrieved because it contains a valuable lottery ticket. Meanwhile Oliver and Shane struggle to navigate their new romance; and Norman and Rita encounter a rough patch in their relationship.
cast: Eric Mabius|Kristin Booth|Yan-Kay Crystal Lowe|Geoff Gustafson|Gregory Harrison|Emma Pedersen|Emilie Ullerup|Peter Hanlon|Lane Edwards|Zak Santiago|Nolan Gerard Funk|Nikolay Voronovich|Maria Nikolishina|Dale Wolfe|Bailey Skodje|Ramon Terrell|Winslow Holmes|Stew McLean
title: Signed, Sealed, Delivered: One in a Million
